website_summaries.verdict: One of the most enduring designs of the brand is the Skechers Energy. It continues to be a quintessential favorite among women who grew up with the all-familiar silhouette from their teens. The thick-soled sneaker with leather overlays is a coveted fitness and exercise kick for many women. Now made for all genders, the Skechers Energy design has been tweaked with more than a hundred color variations, combinations, materials, and designs but only two models remain a classic favorite – the all-white and all-black sneakers.
pros: The vast majority of customers have shared that the Skechers Energy sneaker brings a nostalgic appeal
Several reviewers have disclosed that the sneaker has removable insoles that can be readily replaced with orthotic inserts for extra comfort
A large number of reviewers appreciate the shoe’s more than inch-high thick soles that give extra height and stability
The leather overlays at the toe, side, and heels give extra protection to the feet when doing exercises or hiking on the trail, some reviewers have said
Numerous wearers have observed that the shock-absorbing midsole feels comfortable and supportive making it perfect for exercise and active sports
Quite a lot of purchasers share that this model of Skechers sneakers has a soft cushioned insole that adds to the cozy interior
Majority of reviewers like the Skechers Energy sneaker for being stylish and fashionable even if its design has been on the shoe store shelves for many years
A few have commented that the compression-molded EVA midsole has excellent cushioning and superb impact protection
The high traction soles have superior grip and traction even in wet weather and slippery surfaces
cons: A few reviewers have felt discomfort against the mesh interiors and limited perforated detailing at the toe box, leading to less foot ventilation
A significant number of commenters have complained that the sneaker feels stiff
The mesh material in the collar and the leather side panels rip apart quickly after a few days of a heavy workout, according to a couple of users
The lack of arch support disappoints a large number of buyers

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for your feet according to podiatrist
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband after getting him the Skechers golf shoes, that he loves. He went to his foot doctor while wearing these shoes, and the doctor told him to take these shoes off. She proceeded to take the shoe apart and examine it thoroughly. The foot doctor said she was extremely impressed with these shoes and would start recommending them to her patients. She used to tell him to wear New Balance but after seeing how well the Skechers were made and the support they offered, she was going to start telling her patients to get the Skechers shoes instead. She said she had heard about Skechers but never examined a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: 14,000 steps a day for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I haul trash for money at night. These are the only shoes I have and I wear them all day. This is the third time I have bought these shoes. In short, they work. I can do 14,000 steps a day while hauling weight going up over 100 flights of stairs 5 days a week and they will last for 6 months or more. If I was not overweight, they might even last 9 months or more. If I took care of them better and lost weight they may even last a year. So far, they are certainly worth what I am paying for them from Amazon. I just wish they were a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Ninjas beware
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes and the wide sizes fit really well. When first wearing, the leather(?) tongue rubs against the sides and makes a noticeable squeaking sound, which gets really annoying. After about two weeks of forfeiting your ninja license, it eventually breaks in and you can walk silently. The cushioning is pretty soft, and as a daily shoe, it's very good (I don't think the cushioning would be well suited for running though). It's all leather, which is nice, as most athletic shoes are a mix of that and thin fabric.The wide size is as expected. For the price, this is a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: einsteinxx

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoe and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the shoes 11 months ago and they have performed excellent I'm very happy with them however last month like all shoes do the interior foot bed gave out. So I ordered some new shoe inserts by Comeii and hope to get another 11 months worth of wear out of the shoes . FYI ....Just a sidenote all Skechers insoles are glued in and unremovable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: A good basic shoe; it may take some time to get used to the heel height.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit as expected. A bit stiff initially, and the heel seems high compared to my New Balance shoes. I bought these to wear for yard work, as they were the cheapest I could find with all leather uppers that were not like the lightweight Champions I bought, which have a mesh top and hence let in moisture when the grass was wet. Still think they are a bit overpriced at $39.99. I usually buy the Costco Kirkland Brand classic court trainers (a great deal at $17.99!), but they have not been carrying them for a while, so this is what I went with. I like the New Balance better, and reserve those for my workout sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Lovie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for this price point!!
customer_reviews.text: As a T2 diabetic, I struggle with nerve pain in my feet. I tried a running shoe, but it didn't offer the support or durability that this shoe offers. These fit very well and feel solidly made. While they don't offer the memory foam insole, my feet still feel good at the end of my work day. For the money, these are an exceptional deal. Since I've only had them for a short time, I cannot yet speak to their long term durability, but if they last a year I'll be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas A. Cote

customer_reviews.title: Great for Diabetic Amputees (At least me)
customer_reviews.text: I am an amputee, that in addition to needing a good fit for my remaining foot, needed a shoe that does not change my height or foot alignment significantly. This shoe meet my requirements. After I got them, I put in my orthotic, put the shoes on and started walking with minimum discomfort. Had to remove the insole on my prosthetic side, the only adjustment I made, and was instantly more comfortable. Had an appointment with my prosthetist who watched my walking gait and made a slight adjustment...even better!!! Great fit, looks good, and required minimum adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Portman

customer_reviews.title: Thank you “other brand.”
customer_reviews.text: I want to thank that other brand of shoe for forcing me to try Sketchers. Love these Sketchers. They fit great, very comfortable, and look great. Almost wore to church yesterday. Probably will soon.
customer_reviews.author: William Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Check them immediately..
customer_reviews.text: I bought TWO pairs....one pair for now, and a second pair to replace them in about 6-months. WELL...6-months later, I was ready to start using the second pair -- but found that the tongue in the right shoe was completely unattached...just sitting in there, loose ! I felt, of course, that it was too late to complain, and so I just accepted the loss. You can avoid this disappointment by checking yours thoroughly as soon as you get them. They were also at least a half-size too small (both pairs). They were good shoes, otherwise.

customer_reviews.title: heavenly
customer_reviews.text: I have never loved a pair of tennis shoes as much as I love these...I have the hardest times with shoes not hurting me after 30 minutes or so...these literally last all day and night, pain-free!! Even by back feels better...they have amazing thick soles and when you feel the inside bottom of the shoe, you will be amazed if this is your first pair!! I I`m not sure about the size part...I bought these in an 8m and I usually wear a nine in women's so I can`t tell you exactly if they run big or small but mine are perfect. I don`t think I've ever been so excited about shoes...lol
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I look for (after having some ill-fitting shoes when I was a boy), is comfort. And these shoes are comfortable. I wanted something comfortable too to walk around in when I was going on a sightseeing trip to Japan. And they look good too, so I now wear them often. I need large shoes, 10 1/2 EEE, and found that they have my size, that I happily bought. I live now in the Philippines where large-sized clothes can be particularly hard to find, so I was happy to be able to find these shoes that I could order from amazon.com Thanks--to the reviewers who rightly praised these shoes, and led to my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I'm a woman who wears a size 9 in women's shoes and an 8 in men's Skechers. Out of the box, these shoes are comfortable. I'm always searching for comfortable shoes since I have plantar fasciitis and live on a farm. I may eventually have to add memory foam inserts, but for now they're extremely comfortable. The ONLY negative I found was one shoe squeaks a tiny bit. It makes it hard to sneak up on anybody but it doesn't bother me. (It's not loud at all)
customer_reviews.author: DonkeyMom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I drive a truck for a living just four days a week. I bought them to wear to work and I m sad to say that in just 6 weeks time the toe portion on both shoes are coming unraveled. So I m very disappointed they didn t last longer than that. I purchased them in June and its October and I m switching to a shoe and brand that costs twice as much in hopes they last me longer than 4 months time. I only wear them 4 days a week spending most of my time sitting in a truck seat, I walk 5-6 miles a day in them.
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Finding a comfortable shoe in the 14" - 15" and wide isn't easy, like getting the perfect haircut. Five years ago I bought my first pair of Sketchers and I've never bought anything else since. I've bought 4 pairs of these white sneakers and have never been disappointed. I wear them out within about a year, but constant everyday use and I'm a big boy :) I would give these a 5-star rating if the insole/arch support was a bit better padded, but that's what arch supports are for! Overall under $50 for a great pair of shoes that last a year with constant use, I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: L. Seldomane

customer_reviews.title: Don't judge a book by it's cover
customer_reviews.text: I gave these shoes two stars because the fit was good and I do appreciate the "sensible dad shoe" styling. That was it however. These shoes are hard as rocks, no shock absorption at all. I kept them because I had a pair of insoles I could use with them, otherwise, they'd have gone right back. They look like they'd be comfortable, but, I wouldn't recommend these for anyone spending a lot of time on their feet, or as a walking shoe. The old Chuck Taylors I wore as a kid in the '60s had more spring than these.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and good quality, but my feet are killing me!
customer_reviews.text: I read multiple reviews in regards to these sneakers. I also was recommended them by a friend. They fit very good, but the arch support obviously isn’t obviously for me. After wearing them for one day at work the heels on my feet were killing me. It was a long shift (12 hours). So I decided to give them another shot and maybe they needed to be broken in. Today I wore them at work for a 6 hour shift and man I can barely walk. Same issue with my heels killing me. They seem to be well made, but the arch support is not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Storem

customer_reviews.title: Skechers sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black and gray Skechers sneakers in size 10 extra wide. They’re comfortable on the sole of your foot they don’t take long to break in at least from my experience. They’re nice and comfy and snug at the same time too. I would say considering the size i ordered they’re true to size so at least now I know if I want more Skechers sneakers I know I can go for the 10 extra wide and I’ll be fine. I’ve been enjoying them for a few months now and I would definitely buy more if they made them in other colors like: red, blue, green, and purple too.
customer_reviews.author: Gumball Bunny

customer_reviews.title: So here's why I chose to buy it
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn tennis shoes in 20 years. Motorcycle or cowboy boots for me. "Let's get in shape," she said. "You need to get in shape," the Dr. said. Fortunately, the better half is a Veterinarian. It's what she wears walking all over the clinic all day long. So, I buy them. One full day for the break-in period. Kinda want to go to the gym now. Kinda like going fishing more, but I'm tired of hearing the, "Have you been exercising" speech.
customer_reviews.author: Keith B.

customer_reviews.title: Nursing shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for nursing clinicals. They fit very well and don't seem to rub on my feet. The only thing I do not like about them is the fact that you can't switch out the insoles. They don't come out. If I add the other insoles the shoe won't fit my foot. They would have been perfect if they had the memory foam inserts. I may return these. Even though they fit well around my foot, the soles are a bit too hard for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: NightMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Read the description
customer_reviews.text: Well I hope you do better than I did and read the description. I think these might be the only athletic shoes that Skechers sells that don't have memory foam in them. So, I immediately had to put some Dr Scholls gels inside them to make them comfortable. I'm taking off one star only because they are hard as a rock to walk in without some sort of memory foam or gel. Skechers, I'm only going to ask why you made these without it?
customer_reviews.author: richhog64

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in the quality of this product. After a somewhat short time period the outsides started to crack and peel away. These sneakers do not hold up to everyday wear. I strongly recommend not purchasing these sneakers!
customer_reviews.author: Tron

customer_reviews.title: Fit is good but
customer_reviews.text: My husband has to be on his feet for about 6 hours a day and because he has sensitive feet I bought him these Skechers Sport Men's Afterburn Lace Up Sneakers, (I have been wearing Skechers sneakers for about 15 years and they are great as I have arthritus in my toes,) He says that the fit is great but that they re not as comfortable on sole of his foot as some others. He still wears them in rotation with some other brands and hopefully they will break in and feel better, at the moment they are not his "go to" pair.
customer_reviews.author: jmvsilver

customer_reviews.title: Great as always
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Sketchers shoes. It's a no brainier. The quality is good, the fit is always the same for my size. Buying them on Amazon makes it extremely convenient. I am near a distribution center so I sometimes can get them the next day. My only gripe has nothing to do with the shoes but my particular wear pattern. I always wear the outside heel of each shoe. But I find that Sketchers take this abuse well and I get my shoes to last better than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Delgado

customer_reviews.title: To big
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time sketchers fan. I've been getting them for many years. Once the wide width shoe came out I've been having problems getting the wrong pair I ordered as I don't have wide feet and have to tie the shoe very very tight and the sneakers top folds over. If I get the the correct size for me they are great and always have
customer_reviews.author: Cruzer1200

customer_reviews.title: The first pair was great, but this pair was not the same sneaker
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time purchasing the exact same sneaker. The first pair was great, but this pair was not the same sneaker. The tongue is much shorter than the first pair I've bought and does not pull up as high as what is pictured. I hope this makes sense but the tongue only pulls up to about a half inch of the top lace inlet, or where the sketchers name is on the shoes tongue in the photo. If that makes sense. So what happens is the tongue always slips underneath the laces when wearing and its a pain in the ***. I rarely wear them for that reason and will not buy another pair..
customer_reviews.author: Pete G

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck all around everyday work or ...
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck all around everyday work or play shoe out there period! I have bought many an inexpensive pair of tennish shoes my last pair $29 bux Fila at CostCo were light and comfortable but lasted one year. Others I have bought either were not great support or foam sole. 2 months into these and they still look like new. The soles are rubber and grippy (but squeek when wet). Black ones are perfect for work I will be ordering another pair of these soon just to keep as spares. They were $29 when I bought them. Even at 37 id say its a heck of a deal and better than shoes 2x the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: Skechers makes quality shoes and sneakers. It's been a while since I last bought a pair of Skechers sneakers and I just decided to give these a try. I really like the look and style. The fit is as expected and the padded or foam support is excellent. I use these primarily for walking. The sneakers seem well constructed so I expect these to last. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Rewster

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I’m always a little nervous about buying clothes online without trying them on first, but I took a chance on these shoes. I ordered the same size tennis shoe that I normally buy from the retail stores, and I got it with a extrawide fit. They fit very well. If I had tried them on in a store I definitely would’ve bought them. I suffer from plantar fasciitis, and I have no need to wear orthotics with these shoes. I am able to exercise for an extended period of time without discomfort to my feet. These shoes are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: RBoz

customer_reviews.title: Good grip
customer_reviews.text: I have now used these for a couple weeks at work, & so far so good. They have excellent grip on most surfaces, & while they do not have great orthotic foot comfort, they haven't caused any discomfort. My feet have remained dry outdoors for a variety of wet conditions, although these aren't touted as waterproof. For the low price, these have performed much better than the Nike's that they replaced. The synthetic leather that these are made of could be a potential issue in hot weather, or general durability.
customer_reviews.author: John Bruell

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit, poor construction
customer_reviews.text: Usually, Sketchers are well made and comfortable these were not. The toe area has excess glue bumps covered by the lining. this is more noticeable after wearing for an hour or so when my toes feel the friction rubbing against those bumps. It's too late to return so I'm stuck on the losing end of this deal. I will never buy clothing or shoes from Amazon again. I'm informed that this review sounds neutral but it is not. This is a review of the negative for not allowing the return of this order.
customer_reviews.author: John b

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Skechers for years and love them. I walk on concrete all day at work so I need the cushion that the Sport has in the heel & the fact that they are non-slip. The ONLY reason I didn't give these 5 stars is the arch. Since I am almost flat footed my podiatrist says I must have a good arch. I saw her last week & had on my white/blue Skechers Sport shoes so she examined them. Her only problem with them was the arch. But, I add the arch that she recommends & they are perfect for me. Very comfortable & non-slip, the perfect shoe to work in.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes - so comfy
customer_reviews.text: I inspect buildings and so I’m on my feet a lot. I usually wear Skechers black Oxford shoes but decided to give these a try. They’re slightly dressy since they’re black and the logo isn’t too garish. Like all of my Skechers shoes, these fit fine in a size 12. Also like all my other Skechers, these started out slightly snug but wore in quickly. And gosh are they comfortable. And the tread is extremely slip resistant and sure-footed. I’ve worn these shoes for a little more than 3 weeks and love ‘em. They show no wear, either. Definitely a great shoe !!
customer_reviews.author: surly jason

customer_reviews.title: I have purchaced 3 pairs of this model.
customer_reviews.text: I like that they come in widths so they fit my 4e feet. They feel good brand new - no need to break them in. I like that the LOGO's are not too extreme. I hate to be a walking advertisement for a shoe company. I wore the first pair until they fell apart from so many miles. The second pair are getting to be slicks on the heels. But they are mostly still good. When I am able to go out "off roading" again I can use them for roughing it. These are not light weight shoes. Clomp! Clomp! Clomp ...
customer_reviews.author: Gerald E. Park

customer_reviews.title: 3 months and worn out
customer_reviews.text: I work as a custodian and bought these based on the reviews. Well I’m 3 months into wearing these shoes and they are done. They feel like I’m walking on concrete and have no padding at all. I can even make it a whole 8 hour shift with having to sit down from the pain in my feet and back. I will not be buying these or recommending the shoes to anyone ever
customer_reviews.author: Stewarte40

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these shoes everyday for 3 months and put on around 1600 km (1000 miles) walking. The heal has worn-through and the treads on both ends of the shoe are worn flat. I was expect more from an athletic shoe. Also, the size 9.5 that I order was more like a 10.5 - has to wear two pairs of socks to get a proper fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Mc.

customer_reviews.title: Not much support.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and the price and the fit, however, I feel like I'm walking "flat-footed" wearing these shoes. Almost like they don't "bend" at all when I walk. Like walking on flat boards with no "give" in them. I much preferred the "heel-toe" action I used to get with the Sketcher "Shape-Ups!" Wish they still made those. Anyway, these were inexpensive and the look okay so I'll wear them once in awhile when I want to look sharp for brief periods.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Guy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoe, Will Buy Another
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality material and construction. I purchased as a summer walking shoe on my daily one mile walk with dog. I was looking for a shoe WITHOUT Memory Foam because previous shoe had it, and they became uncomfortable after a few weeks. The memory foam created an indentation inside the shoe which felt like I had a rock under each foot. Not so with this shoe. Very please with my first pair of Skechers. Will buy again. FYI, I am a 67 years old man and 210 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, cheaper than at Sketchers direct
customer_reviews.text: Being someone that wears a size 16 shoe it is not easy to find shoes that are comfortable and don't look like a big shoe. I have bought this shoe before directly from Skechers and after about three years it was time to replace them. I found them again directly at Skechers, but decided to check Amazon and I am glad that I did because they are listed at a much better price here than they were directly through sketchers. It's the same shoe. Great fit, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ShorttyNAZ

customer_reviews.title: They definitely hold feet... but they ugly!
customer_reviews.text: So it turns out that these shoes are pretty ugly... Seriously, unless you’re probably 80 or older, you will be disappointed. But hey, I bought them for work, and they still are holding together so there’s something. Oh yes, and they also make your feet look super big, so if you have size 12 like me, you might as well wear Kleenex boxes. In retrospect, I kind of wish that they had worn out, because then I would have an excuse to buy a different pair worth wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased with an excellent fit.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit, 9.5 wide. I was surprised. I'm extremely happy because usually ordering any type of clothes or especially shoes usually don't go well & have to be returned. Length & width were spot on for my foot. I would of liked to seen a little more arch support but I can get inserts which I've always had to do with shoes. Overall very satisfied where as I thought I would have send back because of the fit... They were made well with uniformity & stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W Barton

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I worried when I first bought these online...will they fit, not wide enough, pinch my toes...etc...when I received them, I got so excited because by looking at them they were wide but not too wide...I am a female...I wear men's tennis shoes because I get the size I need and they are wide...these are perfect!!! I wear a size 9 wide in womens...I got a size 7 1/2 regular....they fit right out of the box...I highly recommend these...going to get a second pair....
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Wide is wide
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes in wide width for my husband. He has a hard time finding shoes that fit his foot. Right out of the box he fell in love with them. He loves the looks but especially the fit. They are wide enough for his fat foot. He loves these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce B.

customer_reviews.title: True to size!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality tennis shoes. They are true to size, got a bit larger than needed for wool sock double ups this winter. They are not like those cheap shoes that don't have a tongue, these are regular shoes. They are leather and they have a quality sole and padding. Easy to wipe down the leather with a moist rag without ruining the look. Very happy with purchase. He loves them and wears them all the time now. They didn't have to be broken in. Comfy out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal W.Top Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfectly from day one! It's unusual for me because of my slightly larger left foot, and it's typical for me to go several weeks of discomfort before the shoe stretches to a comfortable fit. Surprisingly, it also wasn't too roomy on the right, and no ankle rub on either foot! There is a small vent to help keep the toes dry and comfortable. Also there is tall rubber strip that runs around the sides of the shoe, keeping my feet dry in light rain, and those shallow puddles that are difficult to avoid. Nice plus!
customer_reviews.author: JOHN MAYHAN

customer_reviews.title: Skechers
customer_reviews.text: I am so tired of going to shoe stores and not finding exactly what I want. I have been buying these shoes for years at local shoe stores. Now I can't find them, granted I live not close to a big city. I absolutely love these shoes, and btw I am a women size 7 1/2 to 8 so a mens 6 1/2 fits perfect! I am going to buy another pair just in case while available to have on hand as a 2 pair. Thank You and hope you will continue to carry these!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: The memory foam doesn't give enough support and caused plantar fascitis (horrible painful, no more memory foam insoles for me ever
customer_reviews.text: switched back to these after trying Sketchers similar shoe with memory foam. The memory foam doesn't give enough support and caused plantar fascitis (horrible painful, no more memory foam insoles for me ever, These are the same as I've been buying for years and I'm glad they still make em. only downside is that the stock insoles these come with are somewhat glued in and hard to replace with orthotic insoles.(powerstep) I did it anyway, so far so good! Good ole' Sketchers basic shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Ollie2

customer_reviews.title: Too slippery in wet weather
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic using in dry weather but when wet, these shoes sound like there are a dozen rats all squeaking in this footwear. The other day after walking on my wet grass, I went down into the basement...on my butt. When the soles are wet, they become extremely slippery. So all the squeaking plus the hazard of slipping on a smooth floor/stairwell make these shoes simply not worth buying
customer_reviews.author: David Edwards and Tina Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good-looking Sneakers at a Reasonable Cost
customer_reviews.text: Of course, I like the style more than anything and the insoles are rather comfortable. However, after wearing these sneakers 10 times or so, your big toe will leave an impression in the sneakers even if your nails are well-groomed and you're wearing the right size. But I just continue to purchasing these sneakers because they're the only style that I actually like out there today at a reasonable price. And yes, though that seems a bit superficial, I still like the style of the sneakers that much!
customer_reviews.author: Nodrog

customer_reviews.title: They worked out fine
customer_reviews.text: I thought the out of the box fit and feel was pretty good. I generally wear a 11.5D, and these seemed a tad wide across the ball of my foot. But, after cinching the laces a bit tighter, they were OK. I walked around the house a little, and they seemed to have no issues. So, I went off the the gym to see if they would work out for a work out. They worked out fine! Some people have complained that the soles are too stiff. But, I thought they were very pliable with a good grip. So, they get 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Happy CamperTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Finally!! Shoe Fits Men with BIG Feet!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my hubby..Let me first say that my husband hates when I buy clothes for him because they rarely fit him, that being said the shoes fit him perfectly. Mike wears a 13 wide = 5E (5Es are difficult to find) and these shoes were labeled 13 extra wide. Mike's comment was other than the shoes feeling clunky, meaning he felt Frankenstein when he walks in them. Mike admitted that with time he'll adjust to them. Mike is an computer tech so he's on his feet a lot. He added gel insole in the shoes for extra comfort and he still had room for his big a feet. LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice all-purpose shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I like this line of Skechers sneaker-shoes, not just for their comfort and durability, but for their use of hard rubber all around the outer heel. This is good for providing lateral stability for people like me who put most of our sole wear on that portion of the heel. I got my current pair through Amazon retailers, to replace an identical pair that I had purchased at a local Modell's Sporting Goods; through business (retail sales floor and warehouse usage) and leisure (urban and rural walking and hikes), my previous pair lasted about a year. The only downside is that I recommend using heel-arch support inserts to protect your all-important arches!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A. (Hudson Valley of N.Y.)

customer_reviews.title: 1st time Skechers user
customer_reviews.text: These are my 1st pair of Skechers. After a research for a comfortable work shoe for extended use and reading reviews on this shoe I bought a pair to try out. I can honestly say that after a month of use, they are not for anyone working on their feet for more than 8 hours a day. I stand and move around on my feet 10-12 hours a day, need shoes that won't strain or stress the joints in my feet or legs. These shoes would be great for mail carriers, gym users, runners, etc. But not a good shoe for warehouse employees working more than 8 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Moccabee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes in every aspect!
customer_reviews.text: Just received these and the 1st time i have purchased this brand for my husband and in fact ever purchased athletic shoes without him first trying them on. He was absolutely thrilled with the style snd immediately going on about the comfort of these shoes. He is very hard to fit and getting the size,comfort and style all in one and at a great price was just perfect. I purchased 9and1/2 wide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a family member who wears a men's size nine and they fit perfectly with standard athletic socks. They're an attractive solid black color which looks great with jeans or athletic wear. They're nicely cushioned for general wear or athletic walking as well. The exterior is easy to clean if mud gets on it (if you wait until the mud dries to sweep it off). Overall, these are comfortable and attractive and I certainly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: BethTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed when purchased these for daily walking routine
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the price of these shoes after discount, as well as their appearance. I had read the generally positive reviews carefully. But after receiving them I was disappointed to find that they seemed heavy and stiff, and I was not able to feel comfortable in them even after several miles walking in them. I am reluctant to return things, but I did in this case. Amazon was extremely cooperative with the return, and I received a refund very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Marty H

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: I'm typically a Saucony guy (great arch support and thick cushion soles for my old feet) but their black work sneaker disappointed me. It made a squeak noise after just a few weeks. Never had that issue with their shoes. Decided to try these because I had tried almost every other black work sneaker brand. Great fit, very comfortable and has with stood work torture. Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Jchumpfree

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable all day shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Wife got me these to replace old Nike Air. That were falling apart. I wear Tenny's till they get ugly then turn them into light duty construction shoes till they fall apart. These seam to be a better quality shoe than my old Nike Air that look very similar. Construction of them seems more rugged. And are a pleasure to wear all day. Can’t wait to get them ugly so I can wear them too work.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Stiff Soles
customer_reviews.text: I never had a pair of stiff sole shoes. My shoes always bend as I walk with a natural feel and gait. These shoes do not bend and make walking much different with a pronounced heel to toe "clump-clump". I don't know how to relax this stiff sole. I don't want to walk like this. I doubt if I'll use them. They look great, but hat's all I can say positively.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Not sewn correctly
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time to purchase these shoes. I really liked the original pair I had bought more than a year ago. When I received the 2nd pair, I set them aside, as the first pair had a few months more life in them. When I got the new pair out to wear, one of the tongues on one of the was not attached. It had been too long since I had purchased them, so I could not return. I instead had to attach the tongue with some glue and by sewing it. If I could have, I would have returned them. Good shoes otherwise, just sloppy construction, and sloppy inspection before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: I could hace used a wide
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because they are a well thought of name brand. This particular style is discontinued so the price was good too. I knew I should have gotten a wide. But none were available in this model or price. I only wear them for the morning and evening walks I take when weather permits. Living in the city all walking is done on concrete and blacktop. Even then, all things considered, they work well for me and I foresee them lasting quit a while.
customer_reviews.author: Thunder

customer_reviews.title: Cheap made in chinastanwan
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as it once was. I’ve had several pairs of these shoes over the years, and this most recent pair is obviously much lower quality. Not glued or sewn together properly, makes noise when walking. Very cheap, will not last long. It seems sketchers may have outsourced their production recently.
customer_reviews.author: Alpaca Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Not the show I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker has something wrong with it that I cannot determine. They don't hurt when I have them on, but when i take them off, the right foot feels as if my arch has dropped - almost as if i did not have any arch support. It takes a few hours before my arch feels normal again. I had to stop wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: mmmmmmm

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These fit my wide feet really well. I am a large size woman at 5' 10", and wear men's athletic shoes in 9.5 wide usually. The only issue that I have is, the insoles are really uncomfortable for me. They seem thinner than they should be. So I had to get insoles to keep the bottom of my feet from hurting. Other than that. They are wide enough, and I love the tread on them also. ☺
customer_reviews.author: Domestic Diva

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding, comfortable sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some sneakers that wouldn't feel like they were constricting my feet after wearing them all day. Well, I found them! These sneakers fit just perfectly, having just had knee surgery, I was concerned they may aggravate the injury, not at all! Very comfortable after 8 hours in them. I bought the wider size so I can almost slip into them, given a full right leg brace. 5 stars on these and they look great too!
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Very good traction. Runs a bit small by a 1/2 size or so. Soles are very rugged and do trap stones in the groves so be aware if you wear them indoors and have hardwood floors. Exchanged for a 1/2 size larger and now have the correct size. Still not the most comfortable sneaker I’ve purchase because of the stiff liner. Will update after I get to put some miles on them.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneakers especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third set of these sneakers I have bought. They look good, fit well, and have excellent traction on wet or slick surfaces. I had previously bought two black pair - one pair for wearing while I cut grass and another for everyday use. I still have both black pair but decided to buy a white pair for a change of pace, and it's hard to beat the price of these.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if its me or the product but it was awfully uncomfortable. As soon as I put them on and started walking in my home my back started to hurt. Soles are hard, no give - Not for Me! K Powers
customer_reviews.author: Kp~

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are fine, fit great and are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are fine, fit great and are very comfortable. The reason I gave them 2 stars was that they were sold as "NEW" but they were not new maybe like new. The box was beat to hell and one corner was even held together by tape. All the tags and stickers were already removed from the shoes as well. These shoes had to be a return item and should have been labeled as such.
customer_reviews.author: jackmoose64

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I am always leery about buying footware online (without really trying them on first). However, with fewer and fewer shoe stores nearby, I decided to take a chance. True to size and width, these are very good sneakers for the price. I wish I could have given these five stars, but, didn't because the cushioning (while adequate) could have been a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: smart consumer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Constructed
customer_reviews.text: Good Looking, BUT PAINFUL ! Sewn seams on inside are large, rough and very painful across the top of your foot. Tried everything to smooth or reduce them but nothing worked. I continued to try to make them wearable for several weeks. Could not return because I passed the deadline. I have several pairs of Sketchers light weight shoes and I love them. However, these Skechers Men's Energy Afterburn Lace-Up Sneakers are a disaster. I DO NOT recommend that you even consider this style sneaker from Sketchers.
customer_reviews.author: Low Country Boy

customer_reviews.title: A VERY COMFORTABLE SHOE FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: i have pretty wide feet. I was plesantly surprised when wearing these shoes how good they felt. I had to wear them a couple of days to stretch them out but overall they are very cushy and seem to be built well. I dont like the pattern on the laces..There are too many lace holes for me. Looks like there are a couple of extra rows that are not needed. Overall I think they are a pretty good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph  Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: One of the better shoes at a great deal. I used to be a big fan of another top shoe company (N*ke) but not anymore. These blow them away when it comes to comfort, durability and cost. They are also true to fit sizes. I wear US mens 14W and they are just that.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Omg I'm walking in heaven.
customer_reviews.text: First time buyer of from the Sketcher line of products and I am toe tapping happy. The look feel materials jeez even the packing and presentation drip of quality . And the feel ...luxurious . I've never used the word before and never spelled it but if you have been looking for foot happiness in the daily driver category then search no farther my fellow footwear shoppers .
customer_reviews.author: Loves to troubleshoot

customer_reviews.title: MEH!.. They're ok for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that the Sketchers brand would be a very comfortable shoe. But in truth.. These are about the same as any other name brand shoe. They fit ok. I walk about six miles every other day in them and practice golf as well. I got a blister on my pinky toe while walking with these on. My old shoes never did that. So my review is.. MEH.. They're ok for the price..
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Best tennis shoe I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Okay, 2nd review for both my white, and these black shoes. I am very happy, much lighter in oz compared other sketchers. The regular fit, toe, especially the sole grip, oh great trail shoe for me in the Pacific northwest. I will not buy another tennis shoe other than here/these. PS, I have a bad right knee, I'm not tired at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: A.C.E.

customer_reviews.title: Questionable manufacturing problem
customer_reviews.text: Have had many pairs of Skechers but this one killed my small and next toe on the left foot. Painful, cannot wear. Apparently shoe was poorly constructed. ???? Ordered same size as normal. Had a pair of New Balance, put on and instant relief. Not usual for Skechers in my experience, but I kept wearing them until I had to give up. Too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: G. R. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of these. One for my son and one for myself. Both in 14 wide. Truly these fit like a glove and when they say wide, they actually are, unlike some other brands that we have purchased. We jog on the beach and paved surfaces and these are nicely cushioned and provide great support. I would recommend these for walking, jogging or beach combing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fiore

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is either the 2nd or 3rd time I’ve purchased these same shoes. Obviously, I love the fit & they look pretty good. The price is great for being Sketchers, can’t find them cheaper anywhere else. They fit great, look great, very comfortable, & they last. I’m in my mid 60s & retired, so I don’t jog, run around the basketball court or what have you. Yet very active, walking, hunting, fishing, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Cacadura753

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: First time Skechers buyer. The shoes fit per advertised sized, are comfortable with their memory foam, have firm arch support, and appear to be well made otherwise. I'll come back to this brand for future buying.
customer_reviews.author: Greywacke

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Skechers has become my favorite shoe overall, tennis shoes and work boots. This makes 5 pair of work boots and, 6 pair of tennis shoes all Skechers. They're very relaxing with all the walking I do at work. No more pain in my feet after work. "LOVE MY SKECHERS". And I always can find them in my size, (16), for under $70. All other brands I usally pay $130+ just for work boots and, $80+ for tennis shoes that only hurt my feet and have less support. That you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: The extra width is vital for me to have a shoe that doesn't hurt. These shoes are comfortable. Some reviews say they are not well made, I disagree, they seem very sturdy to me. Time will tell. The shoes look good and feel good and were delivered promptly, what else could you want? I ordered another pair in a different color after wearing these.
customer_reviews.author: reader 101

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good for working, walking, standing, sitting lol... Just great shoes I have 2 pair and one pair lasted me 5 years before it started to deteriorate. The other pair is on year 2 and still looks new.. I beat em up all winter and still just great padding materials...etc... well worth the 50 bucks but if you can find em on sale grab these. Wide with is godsent for me and fit so nicely. I use them for everything. They are my daily shoe. Wish I could find a few different variants of it but the white is nice and looks good with just about any outfit.
customer_reviews.author: JohnguyMichigan

customer_reviews.title: Greta value
customer_reviews.text: I typically buy more expensive running/walking shoes, but tried Sketchers for the first time because I can no longer wear Asics. (They changed the last). This is a very comfortable pair of shoes similar to New Balance but at half the price. I prefer little more arch support, but there are no shoes on the market that give me what I am looking for. This pair comes close.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco D'Ancona

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.. Heavy and rigid
customer_reviews.text: I had bought my 1st pair of Sketchers some weeks back from a retail store and have been delighted with them. I've never like buying shoes or clothing online. Always fearful of improper fit. But I figured buying same brand and size should be ok. These were the same brand and size, however they are more "snug" than the other pair. For an athletic shoe I find them heavy and rigid. I'm keeping them but I doubt I'll be exercising in them. Probably make them my "dress sneakers"
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I think they look a little better than the NB
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 size 12D. One fit and the other was too small (cramped the toes). Returned the too small pair and bought 13D to try. 13D fit ok, maybe slightly more room at toes than then12D I kept. I have worn New Balance 608 & 623 in 12.5D and thought I would try something different. The sketchers are ok, I think they look a little better than the NB, but the NB are a little more comfortable and flex better than the Sketchers. Not sure yet if I would buy again, may just stay with the NB.
customer_reviews.author: Scottsdale, AZ

customer_reviews.title: I Had To Write A Positive Review!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black! I can't believe I may like them every bit as much as the white/navy which I have previously owned! They fit the same! Good quality & affordable sharp looking sneaker that I anticipate will look great and last me quite awhile! A nice compliment to my wardrobe! I was surprised at how much I like them, maybe even more than the white! Thanks Skechers! Proud to wear your brand!
customer_reviews.author: Rae'chelle

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is great. I wear a 10.5 wide, I ordered a 10.5w and received a 10.5w. Perfect fit. These shoes are comfortable, nice looking and comfortable. I instantly went from 5'8" to 5'9". Lol
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 pairs of this shoe in different colors. My job requires me to stand 8 to 10 hours a day on a concrete floor. My first week was extremely uncomfortable until I bought my first pair of Skechers. I am a loyal Skechers wearer now! Comfortable and a great price. Just the right support. LOVE them! A+++++ HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jackie everhart

customer_reviews.title: Not a good experience..
customer_reviews.text: Sketchers are usually a fairly safe bet when buying sneakers, this particular pair look good, and seem very well constructed, however, for me anyway, they feel more like medieval stone carved shoes rather than sneakers. These absolutely kill my feet and since I missed the return window ( bought em for a trip and didn't take them out of the box for weeks, my fault) they are destined for the Salvation Army box. Hope someone can get some use out of em, it just wasn't me.
customer_reviews.author: D. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: They Are Very Comfortable; And
customer_reviews.text: I Now Have Two Pair Of Skechers Sport Shoes. The One In The 'Brown Suede;' Then, The Other In The 'White And Blue' Hue. Both Pair Fit My Small Feet (71/2-D-US) Very Well; And, They Are Very Comfortable; And, Yet, The Quality And Price Far Out Weigh Having To Drive To A Store, Try Them On, Pay For The Over-Pricing; Then, Have To Drive Back Home! It Is Nice To Search On Amazon, Locate The Products, Order The Products; Then, They Are Delivered To Our Home; And, From The Comfort Of Our Home From My Computer Chair! Thank You, Amazon, For Providing The Goods, Quality, Pricing, With Exceptional Delivery Options. Darwin Hinson.
customer_reviews.author: darwin hinson

customer_reviews.title: Really, really comfortable shoe, even for heavy guys!
customer_reviews.text: Even though it was slightly large on my foot, I am admittedly amazed at how comfortable they are. I do not run, but I do jump rope in and out of the gym to elevate my workouts, and they are perfect for that. I am heavy, roughly 265, so I need cushioning. These are really awesome. Never had Sketchers before. Chose these over the New Balance MX608 series. Great choice on my part! I am now a Sketchers fan!
customer_reviews.author: Tucson Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and unwearable after only a couple of months of occasional use.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable at first, but the foam compressed and then the sole has a high arch support which extends under the ball of my foot, then a very deep groove under the joints of my toes, then a lump under the tips of my toes. These shoes are very UNCOMFORTABLE to wear walking and also just to sit to eat or play cards.
customer_reviews.author: noel Alt

customer_reviews.title: precise  fit
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance and ordered shoes on-line. When order I used my old shoes size. And made plans to return them. I took delivery of them and they fit perfectly. And fit very well. They were also delivered way a head of schedule by 3 days. I plan to book mark this order for future orders. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Peter Forthofer

customer_reviews.title: Great price but a bit to hard on the sole
customer_reviews.text: I got a great price on these but there was to hard a feel on the foot sole. I put in some gel inserts over the top of the original inserts and then the top of my feet got sore. Took the original inserts out (they are glued in so i used a hair dryer to heat them up for removal) and now with the new gel inserts they are good to go!
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: These came a little big but works great with added insoles
customer_reviews.text: These shoes actually come a little bigger than I have normally expected. I wear an 8 1/2 wide. These came pretty loose but on the positive side I was able to put some nice insoles and they fit much better. I usually buy the 8 1/2 wide and can never find a high enough arch support as my arches are really high, and inserting insoles normally makes the shoes a little tight. But because of their size it works really well because it makes a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Bayouman

customer_reviews.title: I wish they fit
customer_reviews.text: I like all the other sketcher shoes I have bought, But these are the same size as them, but really uncomfortable to wear. They are very hot as well. Sorry, I couldn't say anything better, Maybe next time if they're too tight I'll send them back before I wear them. mark
customer_reviews.author: Mark Burgess

customer_reviews.title: My second pair
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. I wear for law enforcement work in a school environment and I wore out my first pair after several years. I tried a few brands and bought my second pair of these. No break in and they fit great.(13 med). I add an additional gel insole to all my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes just order a half size up!
customer_reviews.text: These Skechers are very nice and very comfortable I got these for a guy friend of mine who has a bad back. They are definitely helping him with his back and to not slip again. The only problem was when they came in in his normal 9 and 1/2 size they did not fit his toe was right at the end. Thank goodness I'm a Prime customer and returning is not difficult. We got a size 10 and they fit great. So I would definitely buy up a half size if you know your normal size.
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: It's O.K...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit O.K at best, although it's supposed to be 3 wide. There are NO indications anywhere on this shoes or the box it came in, that it's 3 wide. Size was correctly marked and fit good. Ankles are not high enough for my taste, especially with the thick insole that came with it, which is attached with some type of adhesive. Planning on removing their insole and replacing it with thinner yet comfortable pair from the "Dr. S". I'll wear it to work next week and see how it hold-up on comfort and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Kodiak

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very comfortable! Worn it only a short time but it has made being on my feet for 12-14 hours much, much better. The extra width allows for my shoes to be snug but not like sardines in a can, rolling over themselves. Highly recommend for anyone on their feet for long periods or walking distances.
customer_reviews.author: Anita B.

product_meta.title: Skechers Mens 50081
product_meta.description: Whether you're out for a jog or hitting the gym, this cushioned, flexible trainer gives you the performance you need.
